pullrequest.title: Move artifact origin to center of tunnel entrance

content.raw:
> I also noticed that the staging area is currently a 15 m radius from the base, which is not enough to get to the entrance, which is 18 m away from it. That means teams can't use this service all the way to the very entrance. I don't know if that's a problem.

it used to be a 10 m radius, which was smaller than the initial radius of several robots, so I increased it to 15 in  29ef2d7 of pull request #166 

I think it would be fine to increase it further; I just went for a round number
content.html:
I also noticed that the staging area is currently a 15 m radius from the base, which is not enough to get to the entrance, which is 18 m away from it. That means teams can't use this service all the way to the very entrance. I don't know if that's a problem.

it used to be a 10 m radius, which was smaller than the initial radius of several robots, so I increased it to 15 in 29ef2d7 of pull request #166

I think it would be fine to increase it further; I just went for a round number
